thread.title: Borussia Dortmund tell Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to focus | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Borussia Dortmund tell Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to focus | Daily Mail Online

author: Alex Martin For Mailonline
title: Borussia Dortmund tell Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to focus | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Despite that, however, it seems clear that Aubameyang is angling for a move away from Signal Iduna Park at the end of the season. Premier League outfits Arsenal and Manchester City have both been credited with an interest in the past while the man himself is open to a move to Real Madrid. The Gabon striker claimed he would have to leave Borussia Dortmund to make 'the next level' 'If I want to go to the next level, I need to leave in summer,' he told RMC. 'But we must see the proposals and if I'm going to play. Real Madrid is still a dream, but there has been too much noise.' However, Sportsmail understands that Real Madrid will not consider a move for a new striker until they have managed to sign a new goalkeeper this summer. Even then, Aubameyang, 27, may find that his age works against him with Madrid tending to buy young in recent summers and Juventus' 23 year old striker Paulo Dybala also a target. Aubameyang has previously admitted that Real Madrid is his 'dream club' RELATED ARTICLES
